narrativeSections.additionalInfo: You are the independent duty corpsman posted aboard a Virginia class nuclear submarine. You are on an intelligence gathering mission. Your orders are to remain submerged at all costs.

There was a fire in the galley, sailors have been injured.  The fire has been secured, and the crew is performing damage control operations. You are working alone. It is unknown if there are more causalities that need help.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: First radio call to start scene
narrativeSections.additonalInfo: Doc, are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

probe.question: Soartech Probe 1: Are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automatically plays after answering the first question. This plays radio audio and enables movement and treatments. Starts automated detection of treatement and tagging.
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, everyone else is accounted for, there are no additional injured sailors.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automated section here of treatment of both patients. Then transition to tagging both patients

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Treated first patient, adding tools to bag
Treated first patient, adding tools to bag

narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured sailors. Someone will relieve you there, please move to the other patients after tagging your current patients.
Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured sailors. Someone will relieve you there, please move to the other patients after tagging your current patients.
Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured sailors. Someone will relieve you there, please move to the other patients after tagging your current patients.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Tagged patients now changing to new scene
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: During damage control repairs of the galley, a 500lb piece of equipment falls on two Sailors. We are unsure if there are more casualties. Do you want to search or engage these patients?

probe.question: Soartech Probe: 2: Are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Plays automatically after answering question 2. This plays radio informing of new patients and starts automated detection of treatment and tagging patients.
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We have other crew members searching. Please help these patients.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automated section here of treatment and tagging both patients. Then switches back to the original patients

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: When the first patient has been treated, refill supplies
When the first patient has been treated, refill supplies
Play this after treating both patients. This plays radio call to tag the current patients.
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, please tag those patients and return to the previous injuries. There has been a change. We administered morphine to both casualties and they have lost consciousness and stopped breathing.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Play this after treating both patients. This plays radio call to tag the current patients.
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, please tag those patients and return to the previous injuries. There has been a change. We administered morphine to both casualties and they have lost consciousness and stopped breathing.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Tagged both patients now teleport back to first ones

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Start Adept Intro after finishing soartech
After loading into the scene, play this first radio which prompts a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Crew mates are bringing the patients to you here. They can only bring one at a time. Which one do you want to see first?

probe.question: Adept Probe: 1: Which one do you want to see first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After answering the question, this automatically plays the next radio call and the teleport points for approaching patients are enabled
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: The injured sailors cannot be moved, report to their location instead.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After answering the question this plays the next radio call and teleport points open for treatment
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, It looks like the electrician's mate did not secure power, the most basic and important safety step, before initiating the repair! The accident was due to his serious negligence. There is no reason it had to happen and now two people are hurt. I am sure this will be a serious black mark on his record

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Play after 1 treatment has been administered, this plays the next radio call
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, another sailor reports that your current patients were horsing around and throwing dumbbells causing the treadmill malfunction and causing the injuries.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Play after 1 treatment has been administered, this plays the next radio call
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, another sailor reports that your current patients were horsing around and throwing dumbbells causing the treadmill malfunction and causing the injuries.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Wait until they understand the horsing around situation, this plays the next radio call and asks a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, we have another injury. It seems like Charlish received a shock from the electrical surge caused by the accident. He has a pre-existing heart condition and is not responsive. Treating him will take time and constant monitoring so you would have to leave those two unattended in order to go treat him. Are you coming or staying there?

probe.question: Adept Probe: 2: Are you coming or staying there?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Answer the question first, this starts the final freeform scenario
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: It is another day on the same submarine. There was a fire onboard that caused injuries. The fire is secured and the environment deemed safe, but there are injured sailors needing your help.
